description: Certified models meet all ENERGY STAR requirements as listed in the Version 3.0 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Commercial Refrigerators and Freezers that are effective as of October 1, 2014. A detailed listing of key efficiency criteria are available at http://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=commer_refrig.pr_crit_commercial_refrigerators

name: ENERGY STAR Certified Commercial Refrigerators and Freezers
